id: Winnipeg man charged in friend's stabbing
paragraph: Police have made an arrest in a stabbing that left a man in critical condition last month.Police say three friends were walking on Maryland Street near Wellington Avenue around 11 p.m. on Sept. 8 when they began fight among themselves.During the fight one of the men was stabbed a number of times in the upper body.The 27-year-old victim was rushed in critical condition to hospital where he was treated.After an investigation by the Major Crimes Unit police arrested a suspect near Portage Avenue and Colony Street early Saturday.A 28-year-old man has been charged with aggravated assault and possession of a weapon.More from CBC Manitoba:Audience Relations, CBC P.O.
